name: Roll and DIE
description:
The dice have HAD IT with being tossed around with no regards for their feelings. Take back revenge on the parcheesi pawns in this chaotic roguelite.

Play as one of three dice with each benefit their own. D4 Girl, the fastest in town, D6 Boy, the safest option out there, and D8 Man, a slow but deadly beast. Reset your stats each time you enter a new room, or restart them every now and then if you're not happy with them.

Controls:

W,A,S,D or arrow keys to MOVE

Z, space bar or left click to ATTACK

X, R or right click to REROLL STATS

ESC to RETURN TO MAIN MENU
